explains: n. 一条，一块（面包）；（美味食物切碎压成块后烹制成的）糕
wordGroup: loaf of bread 长面包，面包片
meat loaf 肉糜卷；肉馅糕

sentences.en: He was sawing energetically at a loaf of bread.
sentences.cn: 他正用力切着一条面包。

sentences.en: The cost of a loaf of bread has increased five-fold.
sentences.cn: 一块面包的价格已经涨了5倍。

sentences.en: In another room, he saw on a table a sword and a loaf of bread, which he also took.
sentences.cn: 在另一个房间里，他看到桌子上有一把剑和一条面包，他也收了起来。
